title: Feature Request: Connect another time to a server with CTRL+DOUBLECLICK
author: NetVicious
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Hi!
If we want to have two different connections to the same server on mRemote at the moment we need to do:
1. Right click on the same connection
2. Click on "Connect (with options)"
3. Click on "Select Panel before connecting"
4. Select panel and press ok

IMHO it will be a good trick to use something like ctrl+doubleclick, or alt+doubleclick to do the same but with less steps ;-)

Thx for take the old mRemote and maintaining it alive. Regards,

iterations.description: Clear feature request to open a duplicate connection tab via Ctrl+DoubleClick, a common workflow for users managing multiple sessions to the same server
